Word_Entry.question: Place bubong on its proper position.
Word_Entry.notes: It also protects us from rain.
Word_Entry.hint: It covers the top part of the house.

Word_Entry.question: Place dingding on its proper position.
Word_Entry.notes: Tita hangs picture frames around here.
Word_Entry.hint: It covers the front, side and back parts of the house.

Word_Entry.question: Place pinto on its proper position.
Word_Entry.notes: We use this to get to different parts of the house too.
Word_Entry.hint: We open this one to get inside the house.

Word_Entry.question: Place bintana on its proper position.
Word_Entry.notes: Sometimes you see birds just outside here.
Word_Entry.hint: They are made of glass so that you can look from the inside.

Word_Entry.question: Place garahe on its proper position.
Word_Entry.notes: Tito keeps his tools here as well.
Word_Entry.hint: This is where tito parks his car.

Word_Entry.question: Place bakod on its proper position.
Word_Entry.notes: Did you know, Santa uses this to give us presents.
Word_Entry.hint: This protects our house from strangers.

Word_Entry.question: Place tsimenea on its proper position.
Word_Entry.notes: It looks like arrows pointing up.
Word_Entry.hint: Smoke comes out of here when tita cooks.

Word_Entry.question: Place hagdan on its proper position.
Word_Entry.notes: We used this earlier to get inside the house.
